Description:
ENOUGH SPACE FOR ALL!
Positioned in a lovely elevated position in the popular older part of Maiden Gully is larger-than-average family home with plenty of extras on offer at a realistic price.
The private allotment is on over 2678m2 with a long driveway, lovely grassed area to one side and is relatively easy-care for a larger allotment.
The home boasts three living spaces including a carpeted lounge with bay window towards the front of the home, an open-plan kitchen-meals family space with Northerly aspect and a large rumpus room with cork flooring and a reverse cycle split system; this room has sliding doors leading through to the second of two outdoor living options which is a large Merbau decked area with views. The kitchen is in very good order; it features a 600mm cooker with gas hot plates and electric oven, corner pantry, dishwasher, cork floor and ample cabinetry.
The adjacent meals space has a large wood heater and timber sliding door which leads to the second alfresco space - this is also North-West facing with views to a lovely grassed area.
Three bedrooms have built-in-robes; the main boasts a walk-in-robe and en suite, the laundry is a good size with plenty of storage and the family bathroom has been recently updated and includes a 900mm shower, separate bath, vanity and extensive tiling throughout.
There are colonial windows, ducted evaporative cooling throughout and Holland blinds, veranda's and privacy.
Outside is a double carport with room to open your doors, two water tanks and a superb barn-style shed! The shed boasts a sound-proof studio, mezzanine and a large man-cave style space with pot-belly heater and some lined walls.
This property has a bit of everything and is ripe for someone looking for some space. Only a short drive to Bendigo, the new Marist College is close by and you're very handy to the Maiden Gully shopping strip.
Internal area
179m²

Description:
UNDER OFFER | WALK TO HOSPITAL, LAKE WEEROONA & CBD
This fully renovated, weatherboard Californian Bungalow is ideally located, a short walk to Bendigos new hospital precinct, Lake Weeroona and the CBD, ensuring the citys cafes and eateries are all within easy reach. Sitting behind a picket fence, the character property provides charm from the outset with a wide porch at the front entry.
Indoors, a central hallway leads to the three bedrooms, one of which offers an original fireplace with a gas log fire. Double sash windows, wide timber flooring and high ceilings all ensure much of the original character of the home has been retained.
A spacious lounge can also be found off the central hallway and running across the rear of the home is a light-filled open plan kitchen and dining space. The brand-new kitchen enjoys a modern-country style with ample storage and contemporary appliances. Off the dining space is a brand-new bathroom with semi-freestanding bathtub.
French doors from the dining space lead out to a spacious alfresco deck, perfect for outdoor entertaining. This overlooks the neat rear yard, which is mainly set to lawn.
Additional features include:
Gas wall heating and gas log fire
Gas log fire in main bedroom.
Split system heating and cooling
Fully renovated with new interior and exterior paintwork
Modern kitchen appliances including dishwasher, oven and four-burner induction cooktop
Single lock up carport
Good off-street parking
With not a thing to do, this property is ideal for young professionals, a first home buyer, or an investor seeking a home with fantastic proximity to all amenities. Walking distance to everything you may need, this charming, easy-care property is one to enjoy.

Description:
LIVE IN OR RENT OUT!!
Built in 2013, this very neat home is sited on a low maintenance block in a quiet court with only 10 other dwellings. Ducted heating and cooling ensure year round comfort, whilst the 3KW solar power keeps energy costs to a minimum, in a home that is also very low maintenance. Featuring 3 good sized bedrooms, main with walk-in-robe and ensuite, the others with built-in-robes, separate lounge, kitchen with dishwasher, generous pantry and a study nook, you could just move in and relax. The double garage has excellent height clearance, remote roller door, internal access to the home and a single rear roller door accessing the back yard. The covered Al Fresco area is a very generous 18m2, a great size for entertaining family and friends. Schools, public transport, Aldi, Bunnings, train station and the expanded Epsom shopping centre are in close vicinity. Currently rented to a long term, reliable tenant, but vacant possession is available. So don't delay, a truly " No Worries" prospect!!
Internal area
158m²

Description:
IDEAL OPPORTUNITY FOR INVESTORS OR RETIREES
This neat and tidy contemporary home is conveniently positioned in a private court with all amenities within easy reach. With a bakery, butcher and hairdresser just over the road and LaTrobe University and primary and high schools within walking distance, this light-filled property is also less than five minutes drive to the centre of the city.
The easy-care front garden enjoys rose bushes and a native vine running across the front verandah. The home is elevated on the block and the driveway to the single garage provides additional off-street parking for 2 cars. The front door opens into an entry, and then on to an open plan living, kitchen and dining space. Large windows across the front and rear of this room flood the area with natural light, and the contemporary kitchen enjoys good storage.
A hallway off the living space leads down to three good-sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes and two with ceiling fans. The master bedroom features additional storage, and direct access to the two-way family bathroom. A spacious laundry also benefits from good storage, and access to a separate toilet.
A glass sliding door from the dining space leads out to a paved undercover alfresco area, perfect for year-round dining. The paving extends down one side of the rear yard, offering a sunny courtyard at one end that is also accessible from the laundry door. Garden beds along the fence-line feature established planting, ensuring the outside space is tranquil and private.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted heating
Ceiling fan in 2 x bedrooms
External roller blinds at front
Kitchen appliances including dishwasher, oven and four-burner gas cooktop
Secure access from kitchen into garage
Drip sprinkler system in garden
Water tank
This move-in ready, light-filled home is absolutely perfect for a buyer seeking easy living in a locale that is walking distance to all amenities. Ideal for retirees, downsizers or empty nesters wanting a lock-up and leave option, or for a buyer seeking quality accommodation close to the University, this property provides plenty of possibility.
Investor? please contact us today, this could be the perfect opportunity for you as we have a great and pre qualified tenant ready to go.

Description:
MAIDEN GULLY MARVEL OFFERS SPACE AND QUALITY ON 3,000m2
This quality family home is perfectly located in a peaceful pocket of Maiden Gully where you'll find a strong family focus and sense of community.
Set back from the road, you truly feel a sense of calm and quiet as you drive up to the property as the road noise is replaced with birds chirping. The home is set on a landscaped 3000m2 allotment, with lush lawn, established Pittosporum hedge, Magnolia Teddy Bears and blossoming Cleveland Pears.
Upon entry you will be impressed with the immaculate presentation; from the fresh paint to the 9ft celings. The light-filled and airy plan offers a formal lounge room, an open plan kitchen/dining/living area, a spacious master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite and three remaining bedrooms with built in robes.
A versatile separate living room in the kids wing of the house is set to grow with your family and be a toy room while they're little and a games room when they're teens.
Highlights include a charming bay window in the formal lounge room, brand new reverse cycle ducted heating and cooling system, securely fenced yard for pets, ample car parking space, 3m x 6m shed with roller door and 5,000L tank, irrigation system for the garden, 5kw solar system to keep your energy bills low and the driveway has been freshly resurfaced.
This masterful lifestyle property presents a unique opportunity to enjoy the tranquillity & lifestyle of country living while being just a short walk to the Maiden Gully shops, Pratty's Patch and only a 10-minute drive into the Bendigo CBD.
It is rare to find a property where there is nothing left to do but simply move in, but this is one of them. Inspection will impress.
Internal area
235m²

Description:
Charm and Location
Built in the 1880s this brick and weatherboard 4-bedroom miners cottage is ready to be renovated. With high ceilings, timber panelling to hallways, stained glass windows and covered fireplaces, bring your imagination.
With 2 off street carparks and a small terrace garden this is the inner-city investment you have been looking for. If location is what you are wanting this home is within easy walking distance to Bendigo CBD, train station, marketplace and schooling.
Inside features:
4 bedrooms
Combined bathroom/laundry
Wide entry hall
High ceilings
Leadlight glass, timber floors and timber panelling
Outside features:
2 car parking
Private terrace

Address: Lot 1 & 2/9 Strickland Road East Bendigo VIC 3550
Description:
Plan for the Future with this Idyllic Land Opportunity
Create your idyllic home and live the dream lifestyle thanks to this central unique land opportunity.
Imagine taking the dog or kids for a stroll around Bendigo's iconic Lake Weeroona just around the corner before grabbing a coffee and retreating to your brand-new modern home.
Whether it's a quick outing to the supermarket, a shopping trip in the CBD or soaking up the surrounding offerings, cafes and restaurant, 9 Strickland Road offers all the benefits of central living.
Choose one or both of the 407m2 flat land offerings, with all services available, just 800m to Lake Weeroona and a bus stop close by. The choice is yours; design and build your ideal dream home (STCA) or invest and secure your financial future.
An inspection of this unique land opportunity is set to impress.

Description:
ICONIC LANDMARK
Lot 3 and 4 - 29 GOLF COURSE ROAD EPSOM VICTORIA 3551
This enchanting former hotel now transformed into a beautiful residence screams opportunity as its situated on 1416m2
Only a stones throw away from Bendigo Golf Course & Epsom Shopping Centre, as well as just a few minutes drive from Bendigos CBD
This spacious 6 bedroom family home has retained many of its original features, with 2 bathrooms,study,large living areas, outside entertaining area with an easy maintenance back yard, along with garage and shed.
There is a bonus feature in the form of a large cellar, which can be utilized for extra space or a healthy wine collection.
Tastefully decorated throughout and loaded with period features.
-Bullnose Verandahs
-Wrought Iron Laced Trim
-High Ceilings
-Beautiful chandeliers throughout
-Large living areas
-Two bathrooms
-Covered outdoor area
-New carpets
-Freshly painted
-Polished floor boards
-Potential for future development or hospitality/business opportunities.

Description:
IMMACULATE MODERN BUILD, LIKE NEW
Located in a quality subdivision just off popular Tannery Lane, is this like-new home. Beautifully finished to a high standard, the home is less than 12 months old and features a timeless yet contemporary style. Just minutes to the many amenities of Strathfieldsaye with bus stop, schools, shops and sporting reserve just down the road, the property sits in a family-friendly locale.
With an immaculate façade and neat, landscaped garden, the home provides plenty of curb appeal with a timber deck leading to the front door. Inside, the sizeable master suite sits at the front of the home and features a spacious walk-in robe and an ensuite with double vanity and separate toilet. The remaining three bedrooms, all with built-in robes, can be found in a separate childrens wing off the main living area. This section of the home also includes a large family bathroom and separate toilet.
Off the main entry hall is a large formal lounge with double doors. Adjacent to this space is a spacious and light laundry with excellent storage and a door to the yard. Further down the hallway is an open plan kitchen, living and dining space. The kitchen features a stone waterfall benchtop, quality appliances and a butlers pantry with timber shelving, sink and additional storage. To one side of the kitchen, a half-wall separates the living space from a fantastic study nook.
Glass sliding doors from the main living space open out to an oversized deck and alfresco area. This great entertaining space includes a ceiling fan, lights and power, and overlooks a perfect lawn space and garden beds. Gravel and reclaimed timber sleepers offer a path around the home, providing a modern and practical finish.
Additional features include:
Ducted electric refrigerative cooling and heating
Ceiling fan in master (and wired for ceiling fans in remaining bedrooms)
Kitchen appliances including dishwasher, 900mm oven and five-burner gas cooktop
Premium wool carpeting
Secure access to double garage from inside the house and the rear yard
Irrigated sprinkler system in both front and rear yard
Secure side access to rear yard from both sides of the house
With attention to detail and a quality finish that offers luxury throughout, this move-in ready property is absolutely ideal for a young family looking to enjoy a low-maintenance lifestyle in a fantastic neighbourhood that perfectly caters to a growing family. Enjoy all the benefits of a brand-new home with none of the hard work.

Description:
Family home in blue chip neighborhood!
Located only a 6 minute drive to the centre of Bendigo, Lake Weeroona and Bendigo Train Station this solid brick, family home is perfect for those looking for their 'next chapter' whether it be an upsize or downsize this property is a sure bet to impress.
Situated in one of Bendigo's most well renowned and tightly knit pockets on a large 983 Square metre block (approximately) this is a property that offers plenty of size and space for all walks of life, with a convenient inner city location.
The interior of the home presents in pristine original condition with generous proportions and an array of natural light throughout the entirety of the home. The home is set out with a practical layout allowing for ideal livability for families of varying sizes. Entering the home you will find the expansive open plan living area with large windows, exposed brick feature wall and bar with timber bench top and stainless steel sink.
The kitchen/dining and second living zone flows on from this space seamlessly and supplies a great layout for parents and children to enjoy their own separate living zones. The kitchen offers ideal proportions for optimum work-ability with plenty of bench space and storage. Completed with stainless steel dish washer, pantry, gas stove and separate oven.
Accomodation throughout the home consists of an over sized master bedroom which can be found at the front section of the home which is complimented with an ample WIR and ensuite with walk in shower, single vanity and toilet. The remainder of the bedrooms can be found at the rear of the property, each bedroom is large in size and finished with deep built in robes and plenty of natural light. The property offers the option to present as a three bedroom home plus a large study or the potential to be a four bedroom home using the well sized study as a fourth bedroom. Just next to bedroom three is the conveniently positioned and light filled main bathroom with large bath, walk in shower and single vanity.
The backyard of the property offers plenty of space to entertain and relax thanks to the large undercover alfresco area that overlooks the tranquil well kept garden, the perfect space to dine with friends or unwind at the end of the day.
Plenty of storage space & vehicle accommodation is supplied by the double car garage at the front of the property as well as the side access to the garden shed and single carport at the rear of the block- perfect to store caravans, boats or trailers.
48 Harpin Street presents as a rare offering to the marketplace with an array of options for many buyers, a home in this location with such great size and condition is sure not to last. Inquire today!
(ENOE)
Insights: 48 Harpin Street, East Bendigo VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 4 other 4 bedroom house in East Bendigo have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Position, Prime Investment - McIvor Hill Precinct
Live the nostalgia of the 50s in this neat, light-filled East Bendigo winner.
Set on a 636m2 block in Casey Street sits this well-kept and neatly presented, three-bedroom one-bathroom home featuring two garages, an abundance of natural light and period style details complimenting its original appeal.
The much-loved residence 'Mallacoota Lodge' - only having had one owner - also boasts ample storage, double door entry to the living room, ornate fireplaces and cosy porches.
Refurbishing and updating would be idyllic with its floor plan, hardwood floor and original fittings creating the perfect foundations to bring this abode into the modern era while still highlighting its character.
The kitchen offers a spacious layout, overhead storage cupboards and electric stove.
Three bedrooms, laundry with separate toilet and a neat light-filled main bathroom surround the main living space and kitchen.
Outside, it's easy-maintenance with its established garden beds, a 2.7m x 5.1m single car garage, a 3m x 6.6m additional workshop with carport and separate clothes line area.
Adding to its appeal this home has been completely re-plumbed, has had all lighting (including fittings) rewired, and has been fitted with a new hot water service.
The property is conveniently located near a Coles supermarket, the Bendigo East Post Office and the Bendigo East Swimming Pool.
Maintain an active lifestyle and take a walk to the Bendigo CBD or enjoy the fresh air strolling around nearby Lake Weeroona - this home allows true ease of living.
Insights: 108 Casey Street, East Bendigo VIC 3550 was last sold in 2020 and 26 other 3 bedroom house in East Bendigo have recently been sold.

Description:
MODERN LUXURY ENJOYING THE LONGLEA LIFESTYLE 19.66 ACRES (7.96 HA)
Enjoying new craftsman built living, finished to high standards, this beautiful modern luxury home offers peace and tranquillity just 15 minutes from the CBD. The home features 2 spacious living zones, polished concrete floor, double glazed windows, ducted air conditioning, wood fireplace, beautiful clean lines kitchen with country outlook, pantry and quality appliances, 4 bedrooms, main and ensuite bathrooms, lots of storage, and a large outdoor alfresco area with fireplace and new in-ground pool flanked by nearby stand of native gum trees. Outdoors the property is private and level, features a 1.5M dam with automated watering system to the gardens, plus there is a double garage and a separate 16m x 12m garage/5kw solar system/workshop with large roller doors.
This special property offers country living without compromise.
Internal area
260m²

Description:
20 ACRE BUSH BLOCK WITH A TRAIN!
Set on the edge of the township, this treed block is the ideal place to build your rural home or getaway, yet not being too remote. The land comprises of two titles, the smaller one being zoned 'Township', which makes for a simpler process to get a building permit (STCA) and there are no overlays. There's a power line at the front, and blocks this size & zoning are a rarity and it even comes with a train carriage you could stay in. Climb on board the train; next stop Newbridge!

Description:
HOSPITAL PRECINCT BEAUTY
Located in the sought after Hospital precinct, with ease of access to public transport in both directions, this low maintenance corner unit is 1 of 4 freestanding on the allotment.
Offering 2 generously sized bedrooms with ceiling fans. Master with a walk in robe and en-suite, 2nd bedroom comprising a built in robe and situated next to the family bathroom.
Featuring an open plan kitchen, meals living area with a split system for heating & cooling, which flows out onto a beautiful large decked veranda that continues around to the front of the unit, overlooking the well established garden.
Situated at the front of the unit is a study with built in robe, perfect for the work/study from home individual, also with a great view of the gardens.
This fully fenced property has access from the rear of the garage directly into the laundry.
An appealing property which offers flexibility to suit professionals, downsizers, first homeowners or have as an investment as there is already an established tenant in place.

Description:
PEACE AND TRANQUILITY
What an amazing lifestyle! If you've been looking for room to move and space from your neighbours this wonderful property is for you. This is one of the
original McGlashans family farm house and now sits on 13 acres + a road reserve of 2 acres (fenced within the property boundary on a 76 year lease). Featuring an extremely well maintained timber home offering four bedrooms plus a study, lovely bright lounge, an amazing farm style kitchen, a charming bathroom. Built in wardrobes & cupboards provide ample storage. With verandah's on two sides and surrounded by enchanting gardens and BBQ area with an abundance of native birds. The vegetable garden and chook shed might let you indulge in your dreams of growing your own vegetables and a supply of your own fresh eggs. The old barn and shearing shed give you space to indulge in your hobbies and the 9mtr x 18mtr garage with concrete floor and power is every big boys dream. The three car carport is close to the house. A flood lit tennis court and adjoining cricket net will make sure you and your kids / grand kids are healthily occupied for hours. NBN is installed to the property. Great access to Kangaroo Flat and Bendigo and close to historic Maldon and Castlemaine.
This is not just a home it's a way of life !

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED, MODERN INDUSTRIAL ENTERTAINER
Ideally positioned, walking distance to the CBD and all amenities, this property is adjacent the Quarry Hill Reserve and Ken Wust Oval and just one block from the Quarry Hill Golf Course. With Bendigos industrial estate within close proximity, this newly renovated home is also close to schools, La Trobe University and bushland tracks and trails.
Beautifully presented, the property offers a neat façade with a brand new, large deck running across the front of the home. The front door opens into an entry hall, and to one side are three spacious bedrooms, all with built-in robes and ceiling fans. A large family bathroom at the rear of the house services these rooms, and this space has been renovated with a stunning heated concrete bathtub, custom concrete vanity and timber detail. A separate powder room, and a laundry with ample storage are also at the rear of the home.
Also off the main entry hall is an open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The modern industrial style runs through this entire light-filled area with timber feature walls and a high-end, quality black kitchen. The kitchen enjoys concrete benchtops and splashback, soft-close cabinetry and integrated double fridge and integrated dishwasher. A sizeable walk-in pantry with custom cabinetry provides further storage.
Outdoors, a huge alfresco space is absolutely built for entertaining. With a full outdoor kitchen offering storage, bar fridge, wine fridge, sink and built-in BBQ this space also features a bar, solid fuel heating and a large wood fire pizza oven. A spacious carport provides great undercover parking or additional outdoor living space, and the large shed is perfectly set up to serve as a workshop as well as great storage. The remainder of the yard is level and set to lawn with built-in garden beds.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas cooling
Fully renovated throughout with new flooring, new paint, new kitchen and bathroom and repainted roof
Modern quality kitchen appliances including integrated double fridge, integrated dishwasher, wall oven with separate grill and five-burner gas cooktop
Automated front gate offering secure vehicle access
Double carport
Shed (6m x 12m with concrete flooring, lights and power)
Water tank (5,000l)
With fantastic proximity to all amenities, this home is ideally located and the superb renovation ensures there is not a thing that needs doing. This property is perfect for a tradesperson requiring great off-street parking and shedding options. With a stunning renovation and a wonderful space for entertaining, this is an excellent opportunity to secure a property that is move-in ready in a popular locale for a great price.
